description:
Durable, grippy and waterproof, the Alp Trainer Mid is up for next-level exploring. The waterproof-breathable membrane keeps feet dry and comfy when rain breaks out on the trail. Grippy soles and a secure fit let kids scramble across rugged terrain with ease.

  • Suede leather and stretch fabric upper with GORE-TEX® waterproof-breathable construction
  • Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit
  • Ortholite footbed cushions and wicks sweat
  • Climbing lacing to the toe for a precise footwork
  • Michelin® Jr Ultra Train outsole with Outdoor Compound Rubber gives a great balance of traction and durability
name: Salewa ALP Trainer Mid Gore-Tex Hiking Boots
